1469290.name: Target Acquired
1469290.description:
About


Where standard military forces can’t reach the enemy you need another way to eliminate targets. Here comes casualties free solution - drones. Target Acquired is a simulator of combat drone usage across the world. In the game you will control a variety of drones, customize them and plan the best approach for specific missions. Only you can take the enemy down - from above.

Your Tasks


•Choose the best combat drone for the mission
•Customise its arsenal and appearance
•Choose the mission, from easier objectives to multiple air defended ones
•Destroy the enemies with precise strikes and minimal damage to nearby area


Missions


Plan your flight carefully to avoid air defenses or destroy them on the way. Be careful, because every missile counts when it comes to completing your mission. During the game you will face many different challenges:

• Recon missions
• Single Target Kill missions
• Escort missions
• Package Drop missions
• Bombing missions
• Combinations of all of the above


Drone customisation


For each task you will need different solutions from your arsenal. You will be able to choose from long range missiles, bombs, guns and many other technologies depending on what your objective is.

There will be a few drone types you can choose from. Some will have more firepower while others can take advantage over enemies with stealth or high speed.

Set up, arm up and get ready to fight.
1469290.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语
